text.0: ye twain are priests of sacrifice winners in war and holy works.
text.1: indra and agni mark this well.
text.2: ye bounteous riders on the car ye vṛtraslayers unsubdued.
text.3: indra and agni mark this well.
text.4: the men with pressingstones have pressed this meath of yours which gives delight.
text.5: indra and agni mark this well.
text.6: accept our sacrifice for weal sharers of praise the soma shed.
text.8: be pleased with these libations which attract you to our sacred gifts.
text.10: accept this eulogy of mine whose model is the gāyatrī.
text.12: come with the earlyfaring gods ye who are lords of genuine wealth.
text.14: hear ye the call of atris hear Śyāvāśva as he sheds the juice.
text.16: thus have i called you to our aid as sages called on you of old.
text.18: indras and agnis grace i claim sarasvatīs associates.
text.19: to whom this psalm of praise is sung.
